description: Task-loop hooks for session context and progress reminders

hooks.command:
[ -f .claude/current-task.md ] && head -1 .claude/current-task.md | grep -q 'task_file' && echo '
ğŸ“‹ Active task detected. Run: cat .claude/current-task.md to see current task context' || true

[ -f .claude/current-task.md ] && PROGRESS=$(grep 'progress_file:' .claude/current-task.md | sed 's/.*: "\(.*\)"/\1/' | tr -d '"') && echo "
ğŸ“ Reminder: Update progress file ($PROGRESS) with current status" || true
